Bay Clock 3   Understand the basics of Vue and Nuxt to learn how to manage Bay Clock     Fully typed  Uses   VueJS ,   Nuxt 3 ,   Nuxt UI , and   VueUse  All data stored in JSON format
Get a local version of Bay Clock 3 on your computer

Getting Started  Get a local version of Bay Clock 3 on your computer  Cloning the rep   Clone the Bay Clock 3 github rep     git   clone   git@github.com:lukajaa/bay-clock-3.git
   Install the dependencies in the   bay-clock-3  folder:      npm   install
     yarn   install
     pnpm   install   --shamefully-hoist
   Run the   dev  command to start Bay Clock 3 in development mode:      npm   run   dev
     yarn   dev
     pnpm   run   dev
   âœ¨ Well done! Bay Clock 3 is built upon VueJS, a progressive javascript framework that builds on basic HTML, JS, and CSS to add reactivity and a more powerful developer experience. Nuxt, in turn, is a VueJS framework that streamlines development, SEO, and deployment

Vue and Nuxt  Bay Clock 3 is built upon VueJS, a progressive javascript framework that builds on basic HTML, JS, and CSS to add reactivity and a more powerful developer experience. Nuxt, in turn, is a VueJS framework that streamlines development, SEO, and deployment  An understanding of HTML, javascript, and JSON is required. I will try to explain each component, page, and function pretty in-depth. However, I reccomend learning the basics of both   VueJS  (and the composition API) as well as   Nuxt .
Understand how and where different parts of Bay Clock 3 are stored

Directory Structure  Understand how and where different parts of Bay Clock 3 are stored  Pages     pages/
     index.vue
  These are the different pages on Bay Clock 3. Nuxt automatically creates a route for any file in this folder.  Components     components/
     Schedule/...
     Styles/...
     ButtonBar.vue
     CustomSchedule.vue
     Footer.vue
     Header.vue
     LunchMenu.vue
     ProgressBars.vue
     Styles.vue
     UsefulLinks.vue
     WeeklySchedule.vue
  Components are used to break up long files or with reusable lines of code. Components are auto imported into each   .vue  file  Stores     stores/
     customSchedule.ts
     now.ts
     schedule.ts
     styles.ts
   Pinia  stores hold state (variables, computed properties, etc) across components and pages  html .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}html.dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration);}html .dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration);}html .default .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}
